name: King's Revenge
description:
Emperor's  Castle of the human's land, was invaded by his enemyes pigs. And they also stole all the citizens money and gemstones. But they are very messy and spread the treasures all across the road to Castle.  You need to help the King Itself ,to collect back all the precious treasures ,punish the enemyes, and return to him to his Castle. !But be cautious ,the naughty pigs spread  their bombs all over as well!

How to play:
Moove: (left/right arrow's)

Jump: (space bar)

Attack: (right click)
